title: I had so much fun with this matchmaking.
body:
12 games, all have contained level 30's that are in the enemy teams favour.

https://i.gyazo.com/6fa3c2b1d29d0eed2caa284e50b9d15d.png

I vastly enjoy versing people with 40+ AP at level 1 and three hitting me at level 6.

replies.body: Wait what, how were **Blizcrank** and **LeBlanc** Platinum last season, but level 25 this season? XD

People that change their names to take over a previously used name confuse op.gg too much. 
Haha rip 

Matchmaking in the middle of the night is bound to be a lil weird, especially with pre-30 matchmaking where its pretty much constantly weird. I think the big thing here is that the diamond (unsure) and plat (confirmed) were queueing with some of the pre-30s on their team. Because matchmaking tries its best to match you up with other players that aren't yet 30, it probably didn't register the rank disparity. 

Its ok though, being challenged is how you get better quickly ♥

I love it when I come across diamond + in normals. So that when I stomp them in lane and win the game easily it just reinforces the fact that rank is ultimately meaningless and is only an indicator of time spent playing the game.

Instead of complaining I'd be watching what they do and how they play. You might learn something useful.
